Wand, common
The cracks in this charred and blackened wooden wand glow like live coals, but the wand is merely warm to the touch. The wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to set fire to one flammable object or collection of material (a stack of paper, a pile of kindling, or similar) within 10 feet of you that is Small or smaller. The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wandâ€™s last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressitems.Item.KPwandofextingui]{wand of extinguishing}.
